Tweet_text: Agreed, reading the bible by itself doesn't do anything to make someone an atheist.  It's taken as fact in the Bible that God exists.  One could definitely judge God's character to be less than omnibenevolent or the way he does things to be less than omnipotent in our eyes, but those issues don't have any bearing on whether he exists or not.
